entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 01:30 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -16.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -19.0°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except minus 23 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16 except minus 23 inland. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14 except minus 21 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14 except minus 21 inland. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
